p.em: Click on Study Behavior Inventory below under the My Response banner to answer this survey. Be sure to respond to all of the statements.

em.em: When you click on the survey, it will open in a new tab. Do not close this current tab while you are completing the survey. Once you complete the survey, you should return to this tab to continue with the remainder of this Module.

body.p: Parts of the SBI adapted from Gurung, Weidert, and Jeske (2010).
Gurung, R.A.R., Weidert, J., Jeske, J. (2010). Journal of the Scholarship of Teaching and Learning, 10, 28-35.
OLI developed and deployed the Survey Tool used for the Study Behavior Inventory (which is now also available to any course developer using OLI).
